    • Board

      public Board​(int xLength, int yLength, float percentageOfDestructableWalls)
      Creates initial board
      Parameters:
      xLength - How many squares along the x axis
      yLength - How many squares along the y axis
      percentageOfDestructableWalls - Perecntage of the map to be destructable walls

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

      current - the current square

    • createExplosion

      public void createExplosion​(Squares center, Bomb bomb, java.util.ArrayList<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> deathSquares)
      Calculates which blocks will be effected by the explosion
      Parameters:
      center - Center of the explosion (Where the bomb was placed)
      bomb - Bomb that does the explosion
      deathSquares - Squares that should inflict damage when a bomb explodes - size of explosion

    • SetExplosionPath

      public void SetExplosionPath​(Squares current, int size, int direction, Bomb bomb, java.util.ArrayList<com.badlogic.gdx.math.Rectangle> deathSquares)
      Recursive function that calculates the affected blocks
      Parameters:
      current - Current square
      size - Amount left to travel in that direction
      direction - Direction of travel (0 = left, 1 = right and so on)
      bomb - Bomb that does the explosion
      deathSquares - Squares that should inflict damage when a bomb explodes - size of explosion

    • GetNext

      public Squares GetNext​(Squares current, int n)
      Gets the next square in that direction
      Parameters:
      current - Current square
      n - Direction to get the next square in
      Returns:
      Squares (Next square)
